body.name: Hydra Barrier CICA Essence Toner 6.76 fl.oz - Unscented | Korean Face Hydrating, Soothing Toner for Sensitive, Oily, Acne Prone Skin (Renewed 2023)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 20 hrs 27 mins
features: EWG verified - Toner that comes into contact with the skin for the first time after washing the face should be carefully selected. If you are using a product with a high water content or ingredients that could harm the skin, including fragrances, now is the time to switch to an EEC product with a green rating that contains many effective ingredients.

Face moisturiser – instead of purified water, this product contains 81% Centella Asiatica leaf water. In addition, N.M.F. and beta-glucan as well as 10 types of hyaluronic acid, from ultra-low to high molecular weight, for adequate hydration of the skin.

Increase skin placement – this product contains a patented active ingredient called 17 amino acid complex. This normalizes the skin's turnover cycle and helps prevent the accumulation of old dead skin cells on the skin. It also strengthens the skin barrier and restores the skin's natural shine.

Lightening and anti-wrinkle: This is a brightening and wrinkle-reducing product with niacinamide and adenosine. In addition, it contains panthenol, a vitamin B5 component that supports you on the way to healthy skin and beauty.

Multi-tasking skin care – this clear, non-adhesive formula absorbs quickly into the skin. It is recommended to apply a small amount in several layers instead of using a large amount at once. Since many effective ingredients have already been absorbed by the toner product, it is sufficient not to use a separate essence or serum.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Revitalize Your Skin : HYDRA BARRIER CICA ESSENCE TONER We need to use honest products since it comes into contact with your skin for the first time after cleansing! Instead of purified water, it contains only real active ingredients. Of course, not chemical ingredients, but natural ingredients! Immerse yourself in the natural soothing power of 81% Centella Asiatica Leaf Water, renowned for its calming and comforting properties. What sets this toner apart is its incomparable formulation, offering a generous concentration of Centella that surpasses typical CICA products, ensuring a potent and effective solution for your skin. But that's not all – we've combined the benefits of Ultra-Low Molecular Hyaluronic Acid to elevate your skincare experience. This real soothing toner features a unique blend of 10 Hyaluronic Acid variants, each with different sizes and effects, all housed in a single bottle. The low molecular weight Hyaluronic Acid effortlessly penetrates deep into your skin, providing intense hydration from within. Simultaneously, the high molecular weight Hyaluronic Acid creates a protective coating film, preventing moisture from escaping the surface of your skin.

Patent Ingredient Unlock Radiance: Skin Turnover Cycle Normalization As new skin cells undergo their natural lifecycle—forming, maturing, displacing old cells to the surface, deteriorating, and finally sloughing off—our skincare introduces a unique blend of 17 Amino acids. These Amino acids, carefully crafted to mimic the composition of the stratum corneum in real skin, delicately eliminate dead cells, unveiling a healthier, more vibrant complexion without irritation. Embrace the beauty of revitalized skin as you embark on a journey to a naturally radiant glow

Proven Marvelous Skin Enhancement: Texture Refinement Clinically Validated! -7.94% Physical Stimuli Skin Texture improved by 0.99% Redness improved by 33.06% Roughness improved by 14.73% Human Skin Clinical Center Co., Ltd. I August 20 - September 3, 2021 I 23 people (Varies from person to person)

MADE WITH All Ingredients derived from nature - 81% Centella asiatica and Allantoin for soothingPanthenol to Strengthen the skin Barrier10 types of Hyaluronic acid from ultra-low molecular weight to high molecular weight, Beta-Glucan (Lock the Moisture), N.M.F (Natural Moisturizing Factor)17 Amino acid Complex to remove dead skin cells and make the skin look healthier.Niacinamide and Adenosine for Brightening, Anti-Wrinkle

MADE WITHOUT Pure Confidence: 20 Caution-Free Ingredients, No Allergenic Oils It does not contain 20 caution ingredients including silicone, fragrance and colorants. It does not prescribe essential oils that can cause allergies, so anyone can use it with confidence.It absorbs into the skin without being sticky or greasy.It is a colorless, fragrance-free toner. A true toner without any scent. Without artificial fragrances and essential oils, it is a technology that cannot be copied without knowing it.

Hydrate, Soothe, Strengthen - works even better when used together ! reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super nice, keeps my face moisturized and feeling plump in the winter

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love Baciel - Hydra Barrier CICA Essance Toner! I have dehydrated skin and this product has been a game changer for my skin. The Toner is thicker than water but thinner than a serum. I pour a few drops of the toner on my finger tips and rub it on my face a neck. My skin soaks this up immediately and leaves my face feeling softer, smoother, and moisturized. This Toner was easily be incorporated in my skin care routine where I layer other toners and products. A little goes a long way!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: At first I wasn't sure about this product, since I was using it for the first time. But can I tell you it's so awesome. This gentle product leaves my face feeling so soft and smooth. Absolutely no drying or stickiness. It just works.... Will definitely purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Your Skin Will Thank You
reviews.reviewText: The clean feeling, the moisturizing and the scent of the product is amazing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2021
reviews.reviewText: My mature skin tends towards the sensitive. Even washing my face tends to make it redden. When I use this toner/essence after cleansing, the redness calms right down. It's also completely scent free and there are no added fragrances which I love. It doesn't leave my skin feeling tight and it also provides a great base for the rest of my skin care.The ingredient list is absolutely amazing! Run it through your favorite skin care ingredient checker and see how many of the ingredients light up in the goodie column. It's got multiple weights of hyaluronic acid to make sure that your skin gets all the opportunity it can to retain moisture. There are also a bunch of essential amino acids that help moisturize, repair, and smooth your skin.Some of the highlights are:🠺Anti-acne: Niacinamide🠺Antioxidant: Centella Asiatica Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Cysteine🠺Cell-communicating ingredient: Niacinamide, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Adenosine🠺Skin brightening: Niacinamide🠺Skin-identical ingredient: Glycerin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Arginine, Glycine, Serine, Aspartic Acid, Alanine, Phenylalanine, Proline, Threonine, Valine, Isoleucine, Histidine🠺Soothing: Centella Asiatica Extract, Panthenol, Beta-Glucan, Allantoin, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate🠺Moisturizer/humectant: Centella Asiatica Extract, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Glutamic Acid, Histidine, Beta-Glucan, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Betaine, Caprylyl Glycol, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Xylitylglucoside, Anhydroxylitol, Xylitol, GlucoseWhy use a basic witch hazel toner when you can use one that also has a ton of other great skin care ingredients. The BACIEL Hydra Barrier CICA Essence Toner is a keeper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No Smell, Slightly Heavier Than Water, Soothing; Suitable for All Skin Types
reviews.reviewText: I think the Baciel Hydra Barrier CICA Essence Toner is likely suitable for all skin types/users. It is completely odorless, colorless, with a texture slightly heavier than water but still runny and lightweight, non-irritating, and not greasy, heavy, tacky, or stick on the skin. For reference, I'm over 40, with highly reactive, sensitive, congestion prone, combination skin. This leaves me with a matte finish and is not drying.You get a fair amount of liquid essence/toner (6.7oz in a frosted plastic bottle) for less than $30. While many of the ingredients are ubiquitous, they are effective (hyaluronic acid, CICA, niacinamides, almond oil). And I'm pleased to see Centella Asiatica, the highlighted ingredient, is first on the list instead of just water.To Use: This can be used in place of your essence or toner or both. Often, I will wash and tone with something else then apply a little of this by dribbling a dime-sized amount of liquid into my palm and lightly patting it over my face and neck. Then I use a good (not especially thick or expensive) moisturizer and SPF (in the AM).Overall, I am extremely pleased with the use, quality, lack of filler, and fragrances of this essence/toner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars made me break out
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to love this especially because of the cica. However, I think it’s the complex of different hyaluronic acids that made me break out. I used this at night and got 2 pimples the next morning. The consistency was light but sucks that it broke me out! Didn’t work for me but hopefully will work for other.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like super food for your skin! So hydrating.
reviews.reviewText: This BACIEL Hydra Barrier CICA Essence Toner not only contains the wonderful antioxidant Centella Asiatica Extract but also some of my other top 10 favorite ingredients. They are the "Super Peptide" ~ Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Adenosine, Niacinamide, Hyaluronic Acid, and Glycerin. Of course, it has many other great ingredients added to these big time anti-aging ingredients that help with the production of collagen, elasticity, hydration, and skin plumping. It seems to have the perfect blend and the perfect consistency for my 50 yr young, combination to somewhat dry, and imperfect skin.I've been using it as a toner on a pad first, and then again as an essence by patting a bit into my skin. It has a somewhat thin serum like consistency that spreads very easily and sinks in quickly, without leaving any tackiness behind. My skin feels hydrated, very soft and ready for the rest of my skin care routine.This Essence Toner has so many skin-loving ingredients that it's like super food for your skin. I absolutely love it, and would definitely recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: This is a great product at a great price.
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this product for a few weeks now and my skin seems to love it, leaves it softer.

Sting a bit. Lying on the ingredients, saying it is 83% centella asiatica. But when you turn the bottle, a sticker has been put on the original formula and now water and 4 other ingradients are first, before centella asiatica. Doesn't seem THAT hidrating. Maybe they changed the formula but it is way worse than when i used a sample of this.
